abstract: Former SAC Capital Advisors analyst Richard Choo-Beng Lee is set to be sentenced following guilty plea in insider trading case; was considered one of most pliant and valuable assets cooperating in case, and was poised to be one of chief witnesses against fund's owner Steven A Cohen had Cohen not pleaded guilty.
lead_paragraph: Richard Choo-Beng Lee, a former analyst, is among the last prosecution witnesses to be sentenced. He never took the stand, but his behind-the-scenes assistance was critical, a court filing says.

headline.main: Cooperating Witness in SAC Capital Trial to Be Sentenced
headline.print_headline: A Cooperating Witness in the SAC Capital Case Is to Be Sentenced

snippet: Richard Choo-Beng Lee, a former analyst, is among the last prosecution witnesses to be sentenced. He never took the stand, but his behind-the-scenes assistance was critical, a court filing says.
